scenario.description: A concise, human‑readable title of the test scenario, indicating which functionality is under test.

summary.description: A brief overview of the scenario’s objective, the expected behavior, and what actually went wrong.

reasoning.description: A detailed breakdown of the root cause, including context, relevant error messages or logs, and any evidence of flakiness or environment issues.

recommendation.description: Actionable next steps to resolve the failure and prevent recurrence (e.g., update locators, add retries, improve waits, or adjust test data).
